items.text: back of a length, angling in towards off stump, makes room to carve it away but backward point dives left to stop it
items.shortText: Nurse to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: back of a length close to off stump, punched to deep point
items.shortText: Nurse to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: nicely bowled. Flights it, angling into middle stump, and Shakib looks to make room to punch into the covers. Ends up skidding on with the angle and cramping him, forcing him to defend instead
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: length ball angling into the stumps, punched down to long-on
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: tossed up on off stump, driven to sweeper cover
items.shortText: Nurse to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: flat length ball on off stump, opens his bat face and stabs to backward point
items.shortText: Chase to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: a bit of flight, a lot of width, and Soumya frees his arms and lofts this cleanly over wide long-off
items.shortText: Chase to Soumya Sarkar, SIX runs

items.text: back of a length on off stump, makes a bit of room to punch through point
items.shortText: Chase to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: flighted ball on middle and off, driven inside-out to the left of deep cover
items.shortText: Chase to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: length ball on middle and off, defended into the covers
items.shortText: Chase to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: ooh, nearly a catch! Length ball outside off and Soumya misreads the length, thinks it's fuller than it actually is. Pushes at it with hard hands, and the ball pops up in the air towards Fabian Allen at short extra-cover. He's a little late diving forward - might well have carried to him if he hadn't been on his heels for so long
items.shortText: Chase to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: full outside off, looks to drive to mid-off and Nurse moves quickly to intercept
items.shortText: Nurse to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: length ball outside off, spins sharply to beat the outside edge as Soumya pushes forward to drive into the covers
items.shortText: Nurse to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: fuller, angling into the stumps, clipped to midwicket
items.shortText: Nurse to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: flat length ball on off stump, defended from the crease into the point region
items.shortText: Nurse to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: stays back to a length ball outside off, punches into the point region
items.shortText: Nurse to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: flat, back of a length, a bit of width, punched away through cover point
items.shortText: Nurse to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: tossed up close to off stump, presses forward and defends with an open face into the point region
items.shortText: Chase to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: flatter and fuller, on middle stump, defended into the covers
items.shortText: Chase to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: nice change of pace, slows it down. Driven back to the bowler
items.shortText: Chase to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: length ball on off stump, punched to short extra
items.shortText: Chase to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: slower and straighter, clipped off the front foot through backward square leg
items.shortText: Chase to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: tossed up outside off, chipped in the air, but in the gap at cover point
items.shortText: Chase to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.preText: Nurse continues, into his sixth over now.
items.text: goes back to a length ball on off stump, punches it to the off-side sweeper
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: dangled up full on off stump, slightly lazy footwork from Soumya as he tries to push into the covers. Ends up kind of yorking himself and jamming the ball into the turf
items.shortText: Nurse to Soumya Sarkar, no run
